OOC: Continuation of the last post, forgot to post for Rat Trap.

BIC:  Rat=
 Trap now spots the spidery droids comming at them, and squeaks in alarm.

=
"YIKES!  NOT THOSE CREEPOIDS AGAIN!  NOW I KNOW WHY NIGHT SHIFT HATES SPIDE=
RS!  C'MON WINDLORD, WE GOTTA BOGGIE!"  

As fast as he can run on his tiny=
 rat like paws, Rat Trap scurries like he has never scurried before.  It wa=
s as if having a cat chasing after him with no sign of a rat hole ahead.

"=
THERE'S NO WAY I'M GONNA FALL FOR THIS MOUSE TRAP, I HOPE!"

--- In nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:
>
> Perceptor/K=
up/Windlord:
> 
> "I have an idea to let our friends escape BlackFortress a=
rea... and PErhaps reboot Nightlight, alltough i dont know how much of her =
former self is retained"said  Perceptor to Rodimus in a heavely encripted m=
essage"But we have to let Tucson know, what Legacy's sittuation really is a=
nd this has been an unfortunate misunderstanding... That he's loyal to us..=
. so far I watched... "
> ************
> 
> Kup and Talon remained quiet bu=
t they lay down their weapons ready when  chances appear to strike back.
> =
****************
> Windlord cursed while he used his beak and craws to kill=
 spiders"We must left this place NOW!!!!!" said annoyed
> 
> 
> ***********=
****
> 
> Windlor cursed while 
> 
> From: Super Cyclonus 
> Sent: Friday, =
January 21, 2011 1:47 PM
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> Subject: Re: Wicke=
d Blades in the Dark!!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Near to the Black Tower:
> 
> As Tusco=
n and the rest lay down their weapons, the other soldiers move to encircle =
the Maximals and the Autobots. Insecticon, Bruticus-X, and Iguanus moved in=
 almost eagerly to pick up the mighty weapons that Tuscon has dropped, whil=
e Inferno, the self proclaimed bodyguard of Hydras watched Tuscon carefully=
, his optic ready to spot treachery.
> 
> Quietly a short message is sent t=
o Tuscon, "Tuscon." The deep voice of Noctorro, the leader of the Maximal F=
uzors can be heard, "My team is here. Rodimus sent us to aid you. None too =
soon it would seem." Noctorro's words are grim, a soldier's humor in them. =
"We await your signal."
> 
> At the same time Injector, Buzzclaw, Terrorgat=
or, and Quickstrike move to do the same with Kup, Nightshift, Straightshot,=
 Talon and the others. Skyshadow, the leader of the Predacon Fuzors just wa=
tches with a gloating look on his face, it is almost as if he wants them to=
 attack and keep the battle going.
> 
> Meanwhile Phobia and several sweeps=
 keep an eye on things from the air, while Terrorsaur and Waspinator landed=
, ready to help out as needed.
> 
> At the same time Legacy processed Tusco=
n's command for him to leave the Ark. There was a long pause, and then the =
temporal guardian's cold voice comes across the channel, "I will not comply=
 with your command. I have been tasked with the . . . >*BZZZTT!*<
> 
> Deep=
stryke transmits to Hydras, "Hydras. I am picking up an encrypted transmiss=
ions to and from Tuscon, he is attempting to communicate with the others. I=
 am generating a radio dampening field now in this area. Only the Predacons=
 will be able to transmit."
> 
> 
> Meanwhile inside the Black Tower:
> 
> =
Windlord's attempt to open fire on the Scourge was met with a measure of fu=
tility. Scourge just stepped away from the opening that Windlord fired out =
from and let the shots go harmlessly into a bulkhead, scorching it only sli=
ghtly.
> 
> However that slight amount of time allowed Windlord and Rat Tra=
p time to scurry further into their crawl space and find an interior bulkhe=
ad to hide behind.
> 
> "Scrap!" Scourge's voice said from the outside. The=
re was a pause and then, "Cyclonus, they have fled into the walls."
> 
> Th=
ere was another pause, and then Scourge chuckled, "Of course. I will be rea=
dy for them."
> 
> From further inside the crawl space the sounds of chitte=
ring could be heard, and then several groups of optics could be seen in the=
 distance coming towards Rat Trap and Windlord. In the darkness their shape=
s could only be barely made out, but they looked like black metallic spider=
s, Hydras' wall guardians!
> 
> (OOC: Rat Trap may recognize them from last=
 time. Also keep in mind that Rat Trap and Windlord should be in beast mode=
. They would have to be to fit inside the crawl space. In the toon the Beas=
t Modes did not have offensive weaponry, except for teeth and claws)
> 
> O=
utside the Ark:
> 
> Rodimus was positioned in a small grove of trees, duck=
ing down behind several large rocks. He gives Quickstride a quizzical look =
as the equine Maximal sniffed him.
> 
> (OOC: Quickstride's sniff reveals n=
othing wrong.)
> 
> He was about to let Quickstride in on what he had plann=
ed when Uproar appeared. Rodimus appears taken aback though by Uproar's con=
clusion that it was Legacy that had turned evil. While Rodimus didn't know =
that much about Legacy, having only seen him briefly while being rescued an=
d repaired, there was nothing to hint that this attack was Legacy's doing. =
He was about to say something when Uproar ran towards the Ark to be let in =
. . .
> 
> >KRACK POW<  
> 
> As Uproar ran towards the Ark, what seemed li=
ke a round bolt of lightening appeared, sending Uproar flying several yards=
 through the air, to land heavily on the ground! Evidently the Ark shieldin=
g was still in place, and it was not allowing anyone in.
> 
> Rodimus frown=
ed, "Uproar! Get over here! If we are going to get back in, then we need to=
 work together. That shield is supposed to hold off all the Predacon forces=
. We are not going to get in by brute force."
> 
> As Rodimus talked three =
other Maximals seemed to almost materialize out of the underbrush, such was=
 their skills at camouflage.
> 
> The first was Wing Caliber, (See: http://=
tfwiki.net/wiki/Skywarp ) an old Maximal stratagist and military teacher, w=
ho from the brownish feathers along his frame turned into some sort of eagl=
e.  
> 
> The next was Leo II, (http://en.academic.ru/pictures/enwiki/76/Li=
oconvoy_gathering.jpg ) the adopted son of Lio Convoy, and who looked much =
like him, and who had obviously picked up many of his mannerisms. His body =
was powerfully built and heavily armored. He looked to turn into a lion.  
=
> 
> The third was Ramulus (http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Ramulus) who had like th=
e others been on patrol for a while, surveying the area and trying to keep =
it free from Predacon invasion.
> 
> They also come up beside Rodimus, Leo =
II, obviously the leader of the other two, "What now sir?"
> 
> Rodimus loo=
ked at Quickstride and Uproar, "Well let's get out of sight, and then we ca=
n discuss it."
> 
> Meanwhile Inside the Ark:
> 
> Perceptor had received T=
uscon's message and sent attempted to send a message to Lord elder, however=
 at the moment there was no answer from the elder Maximal.
> 
> At the same=
 time Legacy was still standing in the med lab along with the others, his s=
ingle optic glowing in the darkness.
> 
> "It would seem that Nightlight's =
vital systems are being held at minimal levels." Legacy said as he directed=
 his gaze to the wall panel nearest Nightlight. A small light blinked, indi=
cating her spark was still online, but that there was not enough power to r=
eboot her systems.
> 
> He turned to look at the others, his face glowing i=
n the darkness, lit by his own optic, and the glowing bar on his chest plat=
e. He raised his right hand in the air, the one with the arm cannon on it a=
nd begin to emit light from it, much like a flash light or a beacon so that=
 the room was illuminated. He casually looked around, "Perhaps we could loc=
ate a back out or reserve power system . . . "
> 
> Legacy paused as Tuscon=
's message came in. He turned to look at Santon, Bump and Perceptor, a look=
 of disbelief momentarily flashing across his face.
> 
> Legacy straightene=
d as his cold voice comes across the channel, "I will not comply with your =
command. I have been tasked with  . . . . >*BZZZTT!*<  . . . the protection=
 of the Ark as well as that of the Matrix. I will not knowingly leave the A=
rk undefended or the Matrix in the hands of another."
> 
> Legacy turned to=
 look at his console as he understoodf what happened. Communications had be=
en cut part way through his message. He turned to look at the others, his s=
ingle optic cold, "It is illogical to believe that I would attempt to harm =
the Ark or allow anyone to take it from the Maximals."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Pres=
ton
